sen.j: 今出川駅（いまでがわえき）は、京都府京都市上京区にある、京都市営地下鉄京都市営地下鉄烏丸線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Imadegawa Station is a Kyoto City Subway Karasuma Line station located in the Kamigyo Ward of Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Imadegawa Station, located in Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a facility of the Kyoto City Subway Karasuma Line.
Imadegawa Station, located in Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a facility of the Kyoto Municipal Subway Karasuma Line.

sen.j: 烏丸通今出川通交差点地下に位置する、プラットホーム1面2線の地下駅。
sen.e: Imadegawa Station is an underground station with one platform and two lines, which is located beneath the crossing of Karasuma-dori Street and Imadegawa-dori Street.
Imadegawa Station, which is an underground facility located beneath the crossing of Karasuma-dori Street and Imadegawa-dori Street, has one platform and two lines.
Imadegawa Station, which is an underground facility located beneath the crossing of Karasuma-dori Street and Imadegawa-dori Street, has one platform serving two tracks.
sen.cmt: one platform serving two tracks と統一しました。

sen.j: 改札口は南北1ヶ所ずつあり、南改札側のみ駅員が配備されている。
sen.e: While there are two ticket gates, one on the south and the other on the north of the station, station officers are allocated only to the south ticket gate.
While there are two ticket gates--one each on the north and south sides of the station--officers are allocated only to the south ticket gate.
While there are two ticket gates--one each on the north and south sides of the station--officers are allocated only to the south ticket gate.

sen.cmt: 京都市立考古資料館→Kyoto City Archaeological Museum[http://inoues.net/museum/kyoto_kouko.html を参照しました]

sen.j: 1981年（昭和56年）5月19日 烏丸線が北大路～京都間で開業した際に設置。
sen.e: Imadegawa Station was built on May 19, 1981, when the train service started in the Karasuma Line section between Kitaoji Station and Kyoto Station.
Imadegawa Station was built on May 19, 1981, when train service started in the Karasuma Line section between Kitaoji and Kyoto stations.
May 19, 1981: The station was built and commensurate with the launch of service between Kitaoji Station and Kyoto Station on the Karasuma Line.
sen.cmt: 表現を他ファイルと統一しました。日付表記変更

sen.e: On April 1, 2007, PiTaPa cards started to be used.
On April 1, 2007, PiTaPa cards came into use.
April 1, 2007: PiTaPa cards came into use.

sen.j: 鞍馬口駅(K05) - 今出川駅(K06) - 丸太町駅 (京都市営地下鉄)(K07)
